data.author: Jan Jacobs

changelog.release_notes: - Fix in custom date format drag drop

Added support for:
 - Heart rate on selected models
 - Multiple countdowns with better rounding
 - Location information


And various bugfixes and smaller improvements.
- Fixed a bug in the countdown tidbit when counting down to 'daily time'
Added a surprise to celebrate the start of a new year!
Pebble .analytics is no more, added Google analytics.
Bugfix: quiet time is no longer seen as sleeping
Improved stability, no loss of settings anymore.

data.description:
A calm, elegant and professional watch face boasting lots of features. Displays one tidbit of information at a time, alternating between them every minute. And in case you want to check something: flick your wrist to activate the switcher and tap your watch gently to rotate through the tidbits.

Highly customisable, shows the info you want to see, the way you want to see it:
 - Alternative timezone
 - Altitude 
 - Battery level
 - Compass
 - Countdown(s)
 - Activity tracking/health
 - Location
 - Moonphase/illumination
 - New year countdown and fireworks
 - Sunset/sunrise
 - Weather

This watch face has been polished over months, optimised for battery life and install size. It features automatic walk/run detection, altitude climb/descend measurement, an animated switcher, pmkey.xyz Master Key integration and is fully localizable.
data.title: Alternating Tidbits

data.author: Dr. Antonio Aguilera.
data.description:
Líneas Gordas (Thick Lines)
By Dr. Antonio Aguilera.

GET an EXTRA day of BATTERY (or 2)!

This watchface can be redrawn at a different rate at NIGHT than at DAY! with its unique Dual Custom Update-Rate System (D.C.U.R.S.), thus, you can save a lot of battery power using it. (Please read the description of my other watchface "Dual-Manía" to learn about D.C.U.R.S.)

This watchface has given two full weeks of power (yes, 14 days) to my Pebble Time Steel, using a 5 min update rate during the day and a 15 min at night.

It features a fresh modern look layout designed for easy reading. It has 12 Thick Lines (or ticks) that lit as a minutes hand with a 5 min resolution. Those ticks that won't lit (due to the selected update rate) are automatically shortened down to a (big) point that still function as a tick mark.

- Four additional dots at the screen corners are lit for each individual minute.
- Seconds can be displayed or suppressed with different update rate settings.
- The Battery level can be displayed to monitor power consumption.
- The date can be shown in two different formats.
- It alerts you when bluetooth is connected/disconnected.
- With a tap or a shake of your wrist you can wake your Pebble up during a long update rate, and have it update the time every second, show the date and battery level, and when the tap time elapses, have your Pebble go back to sleep. This feature can also be turned off, so that a tap does not do anything.
- All colors are custom.

Líneas Gordas, a different watchface for your Pebble.
It's FREE, so enjoy it and HEART ❤ it!
data.title: Líneas Gordas

data.author: Mobilpadde

changelog.release_notes: You've got settings! Woooh! + some minor fixes :3
Completely rewrote the the entire face to c, which is good :D
Change the levels of water, land and mountains..! :D
Added the possibility to change size of your planet...you're welcome!

data.description:
Ready to go HOME?

If your answer is no, this watchface is not for you! 

For quite the contrary, though, you should definitely get this as fast as possible. You will never, ever get tired of your main planet anymore as you can just generate it anew anytime your heart desires.

Each planet is alive, at most 60 minutes, depends on so many things...also, it's seedable! Find your perfect seed and never, ever run out of new planet-seed combinations!

Oh, and before I forget, the planet turns every minute, just for the sake of it :D

If you really enjoy this face, you can purchase it after the trial ends, which lasts for two full days! To purchase it, simply navigate to the URL provided by your watch. Don't worry, it's the well-known kiezelpay! :D

Hope you find your new HOME! :3

latest_release.release_notes: You've got settings! Woooh! + some minor fixes :3

data.title: HOME

changelog.release_notes: - Weather data is now updated whenever the watchface is initialised (e.g. when you come back from the menu). This prevents a situation where you might have been stuck with incorrect/missing weather, waiting for the next tick (up to 30min)

- Added option to use OpenWeatherMap instead of DarkSky
- Fixed rounding error for DarkSky when using celcius, causing temp to sometimes be one degree lower than it should

Santa dressing

Walk everyday to dress (or dress up as) Santa Claus.

(Time, Weather, Health, Xmas)

+ Each 10% of your step goal, one step closer to complete the Santa's dressing. He is kind, so you only need the 50% of your step goal to complete the dress.
+ Santa face color shows the weather condition: orange=sunny, yellow=clear night, orange/gray=partly cloud day, gray=overcast, blue=rain, white=snow, ...)

+ 4 BACKGROUND COLORS: Black, Green, Red, Blue. RANDOM mode. CUSTOM ALL COLORS.
+ Snowflakes: BATTERY charge.
+ Footprint: STEP GOAL progress.
+ Hourly vibration optional.

Designed and developed by dP-watchfaces
Check out http://dp-watchfaces.com/

$1.01 via KiezelPay at

data.author: Bill Simpson

changelog.release_notes:
v1.8:
 - Revised lunar calculation, code cleanup

v1.7:
- improved speed and location information

v1.6:
- Fixed memory leak that caused images to disappear.

v1.5:
 - Made lunar El/Az more accurate, improved lunar path display, vetted more

v1.4:
- fixed midnight discontinuity in lunar display

v1.3:
-Changed lunar visualization to fix southern hemisphere operation

v1.2:
- Reduced use of stored persistent data, maybe saving battery life

v1.1:
- Improved lunar display in tropics and added dashed line for moon path

v1.0:
 - First release of Ephemeris -- sun and moon daily cycles

data.description:
Ephemeris: 1) calculations giving the path of astronomical objects across the sky. 2) a pebble watchface. 
Select your location (lat/lon) in settings.  The sun and moon transit from local midnight (on the left) rising above the horizon, setting, then back to midnight.  
Features:
- All calculations are done in the pebble's small brain.
- Moonphase is computed and displayed.
- Tap watch with finger to cycle through additional information [optional].
Issue:
- B/W display 

Send me email to suggest changes.

latest_release.release_notes:
v1.8:
 - Revised lunar calculation, code cleanup

data.title: Ephemeris

data.author: kametman
data.description:
Circular abstract watchface.

Concentric circles tells time.  Fills clockwise until halfway, then diminishes until empty.

Outer ring displays hours. Each segment represents a hour. Empty ring12 AM (midnight), full ring 12 PM (noon).
Second ring displays tens of minutes. Each segment represents ten minutes.  Empty ring :00, full ring :30.
Third ring displays ones of minutes. Each segment represents one minute.  Empty ring :00, full ring :05.
Fourth ring displays battery level. Full ring 100%, diminishes clockwise as battery depletes.
Center displays Bluetooth connection.  Filled circle means connected, unfilled means disconnected.
Semi-circle to left displays steps.  Upper portion represents 1,000s of steps, lower portion 100s of steps.

Day of the month in upper-right corner, day of the year in lower-right corner.

Full color customization (6 options).

Image #1: 9:56 PM, 7,100 steps, 50% battery, connected
Image #2: 9:59 PM, 7,100 steps, 50% battery, connected
Image #3: 10:01 PM, 0 steps, 80% battery, disconnected
data.title: KM Orbit

data.author: Nev Rawlins

changelog.release_notes: Required Pebble firmware V4.3 or later

data.description:
Cryptic watchface with time shown as decorations (lights / baubles) lighting up on a Christmas tree.

large (orange) lights / baubles are the hours, medium (yellow) are 5-minutes - both appearing around the tree in rough approximations of analog watch positions.  The additional single minutes are shown as small hanging decorations (light blue).     

When unlit (not yet reached this number), these baubles just show as gray outlines.   


A PM indicator appears as a star at the top of the tree.


Battery level is represented by tinsel that appears on the tree:
10 - 50% in 5 sections of the bottom piece
60 - 80% in 3 sections of the middle piece
90 - 100% in 2 sections of the top piece

The battery display can be configured off.


Note that when Quick Views appear, the tinsel and unlit single minutes do not display.


Screenshots: 
(1) Animation 12:54PM - 1.00PM (battery 100%) 
(2)   9:34AM (40% battery) 
(3) 12:22PM (70% battery)
(4)   5:48PM (no battery display)


Design & Programming Copyright © 2016 Nev Rawlins

latest_release.release_notes: Required Pebble firmware V4.3 or later

data.title: Christmas Tree

data.description:
The watchface that gives you your local temperature in Fahrenheit, battery level, phone connectivity, steps per min, steps per hour and graph of your steps today. (Step counting even works for pebble classic!!)

The watchface is designed for those who sit at a desk all day and need that reminder to get up and move around. (Sitting to long isn't good and having the indicators of how much I have moved resonantly really helps motivate me to get up and move around.) It is also designed to let you know what temperature it is outside and when you level your phone behind by buzzing when you lose connection to your phone. 

Hope you enjoy! If so give me a like, send me an email or visit website link to support me via paypal!

data.author: Dr. Antonio Aguilera.

changelog.release_notes: Show Bluetooth connection status in the face center as a check mark or as a cross, if it is connected or disconnected, accordingly.

data.description:
Dual-Manía
By Dr. Antonio Aguilera.

GET an EXTRA day of BATTERY (or 2)!

This watch face can be redrawn at a slower rate at NIGHT than at DAY! with its unique Dual Custom Update-Rate System.

Let's face it, on one hand you love seconds but you don't want to use too much battery, the face would need to be redrawn 60 times per minute. On the other hand, no seconds (boring!) means 1 redraw per minute. Well, Custom Update-Rate means you can set the update rate to every 1,2,3,4,5,10,15,20,30 or 60 seconds.

Moreover, DUAL Custom Update-Rate System means that you can set a different (slower) update rate at NIGHT. It can be set to 1,2,3,4,5,10,15 or 20 MINUTES. Let's face it again, at 3:12:07 AM, when you are half asleep you rather want to read a friendlier 3:10 (so, let your pebble sleep more when you sleep).

Dual-Manía goes further, you can have:
- 12h, or 24h, or BOTH.
- Hours can be shown with a hand, or an AM/PM indicator, or BOTH.
- Mins can be shown with a hand, or a number, or BOTH.
- Secs can be shown with a hand, or a number, or BOTH.
- The face shape can be Round, or Square, or BOTH (regardless the shape of your screen).
- The date can be abbreviated, or fully expanded, or BOTH.
- It also has FULL DUAL location (English/Español), although dates can be displayed in your chosen language.
- You can select to display any number of labels, ticks, complications,...etc, letting you tailor the look of your display from minimalist, to maximalist, and any thing in between.

Dual-Manía, the most customizable face ever!
It's FREE, so enjoy it and HEART ❤ it!
data.title: Dual-Manía

data.description:
A simple analog Watchface for Pebble 2. It shows number of steps for the day (bottom left), heart rate (bottom right), watch battery (top left), phone battery (top right - android only), digital time, date, and a whether Bluetooth is connected or not. The settings page has the following options: 
1. Steps goal - enter your personal step goal for the day, when you reach it your watch will vibrate
2. Invert Color - switch between white and black background
3. Show seconds - whether to show the seconds hand
4. Custom Text - enter a custom text that will be displayed on the bottom half of the screen.

data.description:
Say Hi to the Christmas Cat! This digital watchface features:

•       12 or 24-hour time based on Pebble settings
•       Day and Night Modes
•       Hourly weather updates from OpenWeather.org
o       Manually refresh the weather by navigating to another screen and back
•       The Bluetooth monitor will show “Disconnected” when the connection is lost.
•       This curious cat is your battery meter! As your battery drains, he will climb the tree. See what happens when your battery gets too low:)
•       The settings page will allow you to change temperature, set manual location for weather, and day color mode. After you save, just navigate to another screen and back to see the change. 

One-Time cost of $0.99 + local taxes after the seven-day trial. Your contribution will help fund my education (ʘ‿ʘ)

- Added option to center month text
Added the Health Bar. When enabled it will show the number of steps you've taken so far today.
- Added an option to hide the date

- It's December 7 which means I had to live with that hideous 0 in front of the day for almost a whole 7 days. And I'm proud to announce I finally got around to fixing it. 
- Added an option to use a shortened month. Don't know why anyone would use it but it's there.

- Fixed a bug causing vibration after leaving setting even if bluetooth vibration was not changed
- Moved bluetooth icon in round watches so that it is actually visible

- Fixed some nasty bugs that made the watch think the text was much larger than it actually was
- Ironed out some other bugs that caused time to display improperly when it was bellow time so we can now re-enable a few settings
- Added support for more watches

- Custom font used to give a consistent look
- Adaptive text stays centered while adjusting font size

data.description: Non-vertically centered colons driving you crazy? Me too. That's why I developed Balanced (not really, but it makes for a good story). A simple elegant watchface inspired by the Marked 2 watchface. Once you use it all of those lesser watchfaces will look ugly in comparison.

latest_release.release_notes:
- Fixed A Small Bug With The Date
- Made Settings More Consistent

data.title: Balanced

data.description:
Very simple watchface with bluetooth-information and battery-information.

Blue dot = bluetooth is disconnected
Orange dot = battery is under 30%
Red dot = battery is under 10%

If you don't want to check bluetooth connection, install "Simple-PB" watchface.

data.author: hkjuniordev

changelog.release_notes:
V3.1  Reworked the background and Added a toggle to hide the background lines.
         (The watchface has to be manually redrawed after changing the visual settings!)
V3 Now supports Pebble Time Round

V2.2   Battery percentage display can be toggled now, and also some minor changes to make it looks better.
Maybe this is a final update before Pebble being acquired by Fitbit.

V2.1  Real time display of pedometer and heart rate monitor are added, you can now choose to display them or not.
         Health is not supported on Original Pebbles
         Heart rate monitoring is only available on Pebble 2 HR
V2 It is now configurable! Including invert colour, bluetooth vibration and hourly vibration toggles.
V1 Now supports Quite Time icon

data.description:
A watchface with time, date, battery, bluetooth and Quiet time indicator.   More options can be configured in the setting.

*Note: Health display will go offline when you are not wearing the watch or the watch is not active for a long time. This helps prolong the battery life.


Update:
V3.1    Reworked the background and Added a toggle to hide the   background lines. (The watchface has to be manually redrawed after changing the visual settings!)
V3      Now supports Pebble Time Round!
V2.2   Battery percentage display can be toggled now, and also some minor changes to make it looks better.
V2.1  Real time display of pedometer and heart rate monitor are added, you can now choose to display them or not.
         Health is not supported on Original Pebbles
         Heart rate monitoring is only available on Pebble 2 HR

V2 It is now configurable! Including invert colour, bluetooth vibration and hourly vibration toggles.


More features will be included soon

latest_release.release_notes:
V3.1  Reworked the background and Added a toggle to hide the background lines.
         (The watchface has to be manually redrawed after changing the visual settings!)

data.description:
I made this watchface to get close to Pip-Boy 3000 feeling with having clear view on time and date.
 
Features: 
- 4 colors variants as in Fallout 3/NV games 
- 3 Vault Boy images representing battery level 
- All 6 six health bars represents battery level 
- Icon for charging
- Icon for bluetooth disconnection
- Icon for quiet time
- Option to vibrate on disconnection 
- Option to set on which battery levels Vault Boy will change his appearance 


Feel free to contact me if you have any suggestions or want report a bug. :)

data.description:
Combining sci-fi inspired simplicity with traditional timepieces, "analog-ish" is a carefully crafted throwback to the future for daily use.

analog-ish has the following configuration options: 
- Shake to view the battery status and your progress towards your daily step goal
- Freely set the color of minutes, hours, background and tick marks
- Optionally show date and day of the week
- Vibration on Bluetooth disconnect 
- Visual feedback on Bluetooth disconnect
 
Support us by purchasing this watchface after a trial period of 48 hours for 0.99 USD (+taxes). Payment will be handled by KiezelPay. Design credits go to stegosaurusflex1.

data.description:
Sitting in boring meetings, a train or on a long trip with a bus you can watch the scenario of a snowy winter landscape. The "actors" change a little in particular during december. Due to this it remains interesting. ;)

In addition the weather of your current location or a preconfigured fixed location is always shown to you in addition to the time, the date in nearly any language. 

Have fun!

data.author: Noiob
data.description:
[portal sign plus health]

Original can be found at https://apps.getpebble.com/en_US/application/556382a65c83e51dbb000091

A version of degygii's Portal themed Watchface, which is made to look like the posters in the beginning of the level. I don't like having my battery percentage displayed all the time, so I made it more useful. This watchface is under the MIT License (check source link for details).

It displays time, date and the Step Goal progress as the progress graph. The face contains twenty tiles which change randomly every half hour.



Features:

- Bluetooth disconnection and reconnection vibration

- Bluetooth disconnect icon (in 3rd tile)

- Charging indicator icon (in 1st tile)

- random tiles change every 30 min

- step goal indicator (counts towards average steps for today)

- no fall damage
data.title: Portal Sign +💟

data.author: AndreW

changelog.release_notes: Aus BOM Weather is a watchface that reads the feeds from the Australian Bureau of Meteorology from the location set by the user. Australian capital cities, larger population areas and points of interest that have BOM weather stations are selectable via the settings on the Pebble app. Note, if the location has not been set or BOM is unavailable at startup, the watchface will show a message. If the BOM is not showing a reading for one of the 4 items that are displayed, then the watchface will display 'na'. Version 1.60 adds Battery indicator and Bluetooth connection indicator plus some bug fixes and clean up Version 1.52 adds the ability to specify a manual BOM json web address for locations not on pull down list Version 1.51 fixes a small display bug after location has been set. Version 1.5 adds BOM station name at top of screen and tidies up the display when no BOM data is available. Please ensure you set a location on the settings.

Aus BOM Weather is a watchface that reads the feeds from the Australian Bureau of Meteorology from the location set by the user. Australian capital cities, larger population areas and points of interest that have BOM weather stations are selectable via the settings on the Pebble app. Note, if the location has not been set or BOM is unavailable at startup, the watchface will show a message. If the BOM is not showing a reading for one of the 4 items that are displayed, then the watchface will display 'na'. 

Version 1.52 adds the ability to specify a manual BOM json web address for locations not on pull down list
Version 1.51 fixes a small display bug after location has been set. 
Version 1.5 adds BOM station name at top of screen and tidies up the display when no BOM data is available. 

Please ensure you set a location on the settings.

Aus BOM Weather is a watchface that reads the feeds from the Australian Bureau of Meteorology from the location set by the user. Australian capital cities, larger population areas and points of interest that have BOM weather stations are selectable via the settings on the Pebble app. Note, if the location has not been set or BOM is unavailable at startup, the watchface will show a message. If the BOM is not showing a reading for one of the 4 items that are displayed, then the watchface will display 'na'. 
Version 1.51 fixes a small display bug after location has been set.
Version 1.5 adds BOM station name at top of screen and tidies up the display when no BOM data is available. Please ensure you set a location on the settings.

Aus BOM Weather is a watchface that reads the feeds from the Australian Bureau of Meteorology from the location set by the user. Australian capital cities, larger population areas and points of interest that have BOM weather stations are selectable via the settings on the Pebble app. Note, if the location has not been set or BOM is unavailable at startup, the watchface will show a message. If the BOM is not showing a reading for one of the 4 items that are displayed, then the watchface will display 'na'. Version 1.5 adds BOM station name at top of screen and tidies up the display when no BOM data is available. Please ensure you set a location on the settings.

Aus BOM Weather is a watchface that reads the json data from the Australian Bureau of Meteorology from the location set by the user.
Australian capital cities, larger population areas and points of interest that have BOM weather stations are selectable via the settings on the Pebble app.
Note, if the location has not been set or BOM is unavailable at startup, the watchface will show a message.
If the BOM is not showing a reading for one of the 4 items that are displayed, then the watchface will display a result that is impossible as an indication (e.g. rainfall -1mm)
Please ensure you set a location on the settings.

data.description:
Aus BOM Weather is a watchface that reads the feeds from the Australian Bureau of Meteorology every 15 mins using the location set by the user.

Australian capital cities, larger population areas and points of interest that have BOM weather stations are selectable via the settings on the Pebble app.

A web address of a BOM weather station can be manually entered for locations not preset.
This must be the web address of the json list (e.g. Perth is http://www.bom.gov.au/fwo/IDW60901/IDW60901.94608.json )

The BOM station name is shown at top of screen.

Note:
If the BOM is not showing a reading for one of the 4 items that are displayed, then the watchface will display 'na'.

Please ensure you set a location on the settings.

All major cities listed 
Perth, Sydney, Melbourne, Brisbane, Adelaide, Darwin, Canberra, Hobart plus points of interest are prelisted.

latest_release.release_notes: Aus BOM Weather is a watchface that reads the feeds from the Australian Bureau of Meteorology from the location set by the user. Australian capital cities, larger population areas and points of interest that have BOM weather stations are selectable via the settings on the Pebble app. Note, if the location has not been set or BOM is unavailable at startup, the watchface will show a message. If the BOM is not showing a reading for one of the 4 items that are displayed, then the watchface will display 'na'. Version 1.60 adds Battery indicator and Bluetooth connection indicator plus some bug fixes and clean up Version 1.52 adds the ability to specify a manual BOM json web address for locations not on pull down list Version 1.51 fixes a small display bug after location has been set. Version 1.5 adds BOM station name at top of screen and tidies up the display when no BOM data is available. Please ensure you set a location on the settings.

data.title: Aus BOM Weather

changelog.release_notes: Added the possibility to show 2 values per line (request of Ben himself).
Add support for 4 health lines on Pebble 2 (as requested by Ben).
Solved problem where step-unit (steps or K-steps) was not correctly remembered.

Variant of Biggy Too with more focus on the Health Panel.
Up to 4 lines can be shown in the Health Panel, showing the steps today, yesterday or a daily average of the last week, ... up to the last 60 days.
Also supports the new Pebble 2 and Pebble Time 2.

Watchface requested by Ben.

data.description:
Variant of Biggy Too with more focus on the Health Panel.
Up to 3 lines can be shown in the Health Panel, showing the steps today, yesterday or a daily average of the last week, ... up to the last 60 days.
Also supports the new Pebble 2 and Pebble Time 2.

Watchface requested by Ben.

latest_release.release_notes: Added the possibility to show 2 values per line (request of Ben himself).

data.description:
/!\ I heard that fitbit is going to launch a smartwatch and an appstore (I think they are going to use the pebble one, they bought it) as soon as they release it, I will buy it, and update my watchface for it (and I'll try to release it for pebble users too 😉)

Follow me on twitter @timkrief, help me on patreon: https://www.patreon.com/timkrief

In the next updates:
- Choice between 12-24 hours
- Display AM / PM indicator
- Color saturation choice
- Black background, bright colors / White background, dark colors / random

Notorious is the Best color changing watchface out there! Simplicity and élégance, that's what you need! Enjoy your colorful day with a new color every minute!

Feel free to comment and contact me !
If you like my watchface and want me to make new ones and apps, please donate: paypal.me/timkrief

Français

Notorious est le meilleur thème à couleur changeante disponible ! L'élégance et la simplicité, c'est ça dont vous avez besoin ! Profitez bien de votre journée colorée avec une nouvelle couleur chaque minute !

Si vous aimez mon thème et que vous voulez que j'en fasse d'autres et des applis, s'il vous plait faites une donation : paypal.me/timkrief

data.description:
Another watchface that resembles the interface of the famous Pipboy™.

Everything is really glued together:

-HP gauge is just battery
-Ammo a random value of 0-50 when connected to a phone; otherwise 0.
-Armor is a random value of 0-90
-Menu is just fancy decoration
-No way to config anything like date format (12/24)

Since I am lacking a new model, there is no real support for other watches at the moment.

-More vaultboy images
-Proper image changing

changelog.release_notes:
Hava Durumu v1.0
Bulunduğunuz yerin hava durumu ve sıcaklık bilgisini anlık ve 3 günlük (bugün ve sonraki 2 gün için günün en düşük ve en yüksek sıcaklıkları) olarak gösterir. Ayarlardan renkleri ve güncelleme yoğunluğunu değiştirebilir, saniye gösterimini açıp kapatabilirsiniz.

Not: Sadece Türkiye'de çalışır. İstanbul dışındaki illerde merkez ilçeler dışında hava durumu gösterimi yapılmamaktadır. Veriler mgm.gov.tr'den alınmaktadır.

data.description:
Now supports (Include setting page) - English, Español, Deutsch, Français, Italiano. 

You can not imaging how good this watchface only after you try it, you will love it!

Treasure Box is a premium watchface that include fantasy style and many features you have not seen before. The watchface includes the following features, all of which can be disabled/enabled as you please. 

--Direct write your notes on watchface (anything you can imaging)

--Very useful Time calculator  (Wedding day, Bay born, Exam day, Life remain…)

--Support Health Fitness Tracking for all pebble watch models, include pebble, pebble steel, pebble time, time steel, time round, pebble 2, pebble time 2 ... 

--You can get weather by current location or specify city name in setting page. 

--Show three days weather forecast detail information only need shake your wrist. 

--Battery level indicator 

--Bluetooth disconnection and vibration 

--Timing vibration by setting (hourly, 45/40/30 minutes) 

--Not timing vibration time period support 

--You can choose different color style 

This is only a start, we will continue add new features soon! Please click the heart if you like it! Thank you!

data.description:
$1.50 / Free 3 day trial
Updated with new content April 2017!

==Overview==
Take care of your own virtual pet, earn coins by taking steps, buy new items, and design your home! StepPet brings a new definition of customization with several different colors, items, accessories and patterns to choose from.
Experience an interactive watchface like no other!

==Features==
-Custom made graphics designed specifically for Pebble
-Thousands of combinations with 5+ pets, 30+ items, 20+ accessories, and 20 patterns
-Changeable colors for all pets and items
-Change the position of each object on the screen
-Nurture Mode: Enables a virtual pet experience!
-Secret unlockables

-12 / 24 hour time
-US / EU date format
-Imperial / Metric units
-Weather powered by OpenWeatherMap or Weather Underground
-BT Disconnect Vibration & Icon
-Battery level
-Steps, Distance, Calories, Active Time, Sleep, Deep Sleep
-Disable Health Option
-Quick View Support
-Master Key Support (pmkey.xyz)
-Languages: English, Español, Deutsch, Nederlands, Français, Italiano

==Purchase==
You have a 3 day trial to check out all the features StepPet has to offer. Your one time purchase extends to all Pebble models using the same Pebble account. Payments are handled by KiezelPay.

Remember to leave a ❤ if you enjoy using StepPet!

Dedicated to my awesome dog, Goofy.
© 2016 Elijah Kang
data.title: StepPet

Updated version of the Stride watchface.

See your current total step count above the time. Follow the progress of your step count on the outer ring. The ring turns from blue to green when you've passed your current average step count!

Includes a larger time display, a clearer step progress marker, and is optimised for BW Pebble screens, like the Pebble 2.

Circle of fiths combined with a simple watch. Nothing more, nothing less.

Any comments? Drop me a line to kieselleger@mail.de
data.title: Circle of Fiths

data.author: Rossmallow
data.description:
Each second on Mars is about half of a second on Earth. 
This watchface simulates time passing on Mars by incrementing time by about 32 seconds per minute starting from the time the watchface is opened. 

The current Earth time and date are also displayed at the bottom of the screen.
data.title: Mars Time

data.author: kaaku
data.description:
Simple but Colorful Analog Watch.

Features
- Selectable colorful color theme
- Selectable hour and minute arms
- Battery status segments on 1 to 10 o'clock markers
- Connection status icon on 12 o'clock mark
  (second screen shot is disconnected)
- vibe and dialog hourly
- vibe and dialog on disconnection

Configurations
- Color Theme
- Hour markers display
- Minute arm type
- Hour arm type
- Swap hour arm and minute arm
- Day of month display
- Day of week display
- Battery level display
- Disconnect phone status display
- Vibe hourly
 (you can also setting ahead of time, start/end hour)
- Disconnect phone Vibe
data.title: CIRCLE LINE

data.author: jyntran

changelog.release_notes:
Basalt, Diorite
- Fixed position issue with timeline quick view after returning to watchface

data.description:
Simple digital watchface inspired by Berserk (ベルセルク).

Features:
- 12/24 hour support
- Battery level drawn in the centre of the brand
- Brand changes to Bluetooth symbol on disconnect
- Timeline quick view support

Clay configuration is available:
- Font
- Background colour
- Brand colour
- Time colour
- Battery bar colour
- Show/hide battery outline
- Bluetooth colour
- Toggle Bluetooth vibration on disconnect

Basalt, Diorite
- Fixed position issue with timeline quick view after returning to watchface

data.description:
Watch with Truchet pavement.

colors theme for watching if the pebble is connected or not.
on connection disconnection vibe
on tape second and date
24/12h format supported.

Settings :
-colors
-action on tape
-vibe on/off
-date always visible on/off
-rotation 90°
-Truchet Tile

image 1 : time 16:59
image 2 : time 17:02 date 12/11 (12 nov.)
image 3 : time 17:01 date 12/11 (12 nov.)
image 4 : time 17:00 date 12/11 (12 nov.)
data.title: Truchet Pavement

data.author: Sponkosoft
data.description:
Supports English and German.

Shows time, date, today's steps and the steps average of the last 7 days.
A bar on the bottom indicates battery state and one on the top showing the relation of today's steps to the average.
When the bluetooth connection is lost it vibrates twice and then shows 😕 until reconnect which is annouced with a short vibration and 👍.

--- Deutsch ---

Zeigt Uhrzeit, Datum, Schritte heute und den Durchschnitt der letzten 7 Tage an.
Ein Balken am unteren Displayrand zeigt den Akkustand und einer oben das Verhältnis der heutigen Schritte zum Durchschnitt.
Bei Verlust der Bluetooth-Verbindung vibriert es 2x kurz und zeigt dann dauerhaft 😕 an, bei erneuter Verbindung vibriert es 1x und zeigt kurzzeitig 👍 an.
data.title: SponkWatch

data.author: HelloJB

changelog.release_notes: v1.3 - Light Theme: you can now select to have a white background instead of the default black.

data.description:
Inspired by the Karlsson Pictogram clock, this is my first Pebble app.
